Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Relates to standards for fire hydrant systems
Summary: Relates to standards for fire hydrant systems, providing for periodic tests of such systems and requiring records of such tests be maintained for a period of five years.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to standards for fire hydrant systems; and providing for the repeal of certain provisions upon expiration thereof
